mapper.insert: insert into t_baby_task_record (id, step_content, done_time, create_time, task_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stepContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, step_content, done_time, create_time, task_code from t_baby_task_record
mapper.delete: delete from t_baby_task_record where id IN #{item}
mapper.insert: insert into t_baby_task_record (id, step_content, done_time, create_time, task_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stepContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
